## ContractRoles.getAll() method

Call this to get get a list of addresses for all supported roles on the contract.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getAll(): Promise<Record<TRole, string[]>>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Record&lt;TRole, string\[\]&gt;&gt;

A record of [Role](./sdk.role.md)<!-- -->s to lists of addresses that are members of the given role.

## Exceptions

If the contract does not support roles this will throw an error.

## Remarks

See [ContractRoles.get()](./sdk.contractroles.get.md) to get a list of addresses that are members of a specific role.

## Example


```javascript
const rolesAndMembers = await contract.roles.getAll();
```
